choose.when: insert into chatroom(board_idx, sender, receiver) values (#{boardID}, #{sender},#{receiver})

mapper.select: select chat_id from chatroom where sender = #{sender} and receiver = #{receiver}
select sender, receiver from chatroom where chat_id = #{chat_id}
select match_id from chatroom where chat_id = #{chat_id}
select count(*) from chatroom where chat_id = #{chat_id}

SELECT c.* FROM chatroom c RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT chatroom_id, time_stamp FROM ( SELECT chatroom_id, time_stamp, row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY chatroom_id ORDER BY time_stamp DESC) AS rn FROM msg ) subquery WHERE rn = 1 ) m ON c.chat_id = m.chatroom_id WHERE c.isMatch = 0 and ( c.sender = #{senderName} OR c.receiver = #{senderName}) ORDER BY m.time_stamp DESC
mapper.update: update chatroom set match_id = #{match_id} where chat_id = #{chat_id}
update chatroom set isMatch=1 where match_id=#{match_id}
